Form.TFMessage_20_Percent_1st: You gasp as the spell strikes you in the chest. As you check yourself for changes, you notice that your chest has puffed out a little and is now made of a soft fabric. Though it feels pleasant to touch, you suspect that what may follow won't be so harmless. You easily reverse the changes without any effort.
Form.TFMessage_40_Percent_1st: As the spell hits you, you feel a familiar sensation in your chest as it expands, slightly more this time, and your skin once again becomes a delightfully soft fabric. You stumble a bit and realize your feet are changing too! The toes on your right foot have curled into a hook-like shape and started to solidify. Meanwhile, the toes on your left foot have solidified into loops. Now worried, you hastily reverse the changes.
Form.TFMessage_60_Percent_1st: Despite bracing for the spell, when it hits you, you instantly collapse in place. Knowing the previous changes well, you're more interested in seeing what new changes occurred. You realize very quickly why you fell. You grab what used to be your legs, but now all you hold in your hands are bands of fabric with clasping parts at the end. You begin to feel a tingling in your arms and quickly try to change back, afraid of what may happen next. It takes a great effort, but you manage to return to your previous form.
Form.TFMessage_80_Percent_1st: The spell hits you and you once again find yourself on the ground, having fallen from the changes. The skin on your arms is turning to fabric as your arms themselves flatten out. Wait, is everything getting larger? No, you're shrinking! You're now acutely aware of your intended fate, and the thought scares you. You don't want to be anyone's bra! You want to stay free! You try to push back the fear and concentrate on a reversal spell. You succeed, but barely. You're now reeling, uncertain of how long you can keep this up.
Form.TFMessage_100_Percent_1st: You're knocked down as the spell hits you yet again. You've shrunken down to the size of a bra. Your legs are flat bands with clasps that hook together. Your arms are now just bra straps that have fused into loops from shoulder to back. Your whole torso has become cups made for supporting breasts. Your head is all that remains. All of your skin is now a soft, smooth fabric. Scared for your very being, it takes every last ounce of energy and concentration to will yourself back to normal. You can't imagine being able to do that again. This might be the end.
Form.TFMessage_Completed_1st: The light is almost blinding as you're struck for the final time. Though it happens just as quickly as before, the changes almost seem to occur in slow motion this time. You actually enjoy the feeling of becoming so soft and supportive. You completely become a nursing bra and can not wait to feel and support your master's breasts. You eagerly await the chance to make them lactate.
